description:
When Rito tells Yami he wants her to be happy, including in her relationship with Tearju, her heart begins to waver. When Momo learns of this, and sees how his sincerity has made even Nana and Rin take interest in him, she is again convinced that he has what it takes to be a harem king.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Beginning of Darkness: Sono Toki
The Beginning of Darkness: That Time
